abstract: On Oct. 7, 1985, the Italian cruise ship Achille Lauro was hijacked by four members of the Palestine Liberation Front off the coast of Egypt in the Mediterranean.
snippet: On Oct. 7, 1985, the Italian cruise ship Achille Lauro was hijacked by four members of the Palestine Liberation Front off the coast of Egypt in the Mediterranean.

headline.main: Oct. 7, 1985 | Palestinian Gunmen Hijack Achille Lauro
